app[content][about]:
Abaddon's Veil is a short dread-driven space submarine horror game inspired by Iron Lung.

[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/ice-breaker-1.gif[/img]

[h2]FEATURES[/h2]

[list]
[*] Experimental minimalist gameplay, where your senses can fail at any time and anything could be lurking around you
[*] Glimpse your surroundings through the swirling murky waters surrounding a supermassive blackhole 
[*] Navigate using an incomplete star system map and proximity sensors
[*] Horror based around building dread and paranoia
[*] A short experience intended to be finished in under 2 hours
[/list]

[h2]The Story[/h2]

Years ago, sensors discovered quite the anomaly. A swirling ball of LIQUID surrounds a supermassive black hole. Heat and EM readings indicated the body was whizzing with possibilities. You are manning the U.N.S. Icarus, a scout ship hosted by the carrier, U.N.S. Daedalus. Localized interference patterns were causing scanners and probes to malfunction so... the task falls to you. Deploy sensors, scan the area, and get back to the Daedalus.
app[content][short_description]: A short horror game where you pilot a tiny space submarine through a swirling ocean falling into a supermassive blackhole.
app[content][sysreqs][windows][min][proc: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
